description:
A woman hires the Akutabe Detective Agency to split up her husband and his mistress. Akutabe places the case firmly in the hands of the good-for-nothing demon, Azazel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Demon Detective, Demon, and a Part-Time Worker Appear!
Toujou! Akuma Tantei to Akuma to Bait
登場! 悪魔探偵と悪魔とバイト
